column1: '''A Long-expected Party''' is the fourth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the fifth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
